pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 15, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan and the Premier of Alberta, Rachel Notley.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

National Press Theatre

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Paris, France.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of departure

Media Appearances

11 a.m. (EST) – An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Les Coulisses du pouvoir, on Radio-Canada.
